sentences.en: a spy operating under the alias Barsad
sentences.cn: 一个化名巴萨德进行活动的间谍

sentences.en: Dave noted that the majority of Alias'revenue came from the entertainment industry.
sentences.cn: Dave(Alias)指出 Ailas 的收入主要是从娱乐业来的.

sentences.en: His real name was Johnson, but he often went by the alias of Smith.
sentences.cn: 他的真名是约翰逊, 但是他常常用化名史密斯.

sentences.en: John Lord, alias Peter Lewis, was convicted of murder.
sentences.cn: 约翰·洛得, 别名彼得·刘易斯, 被判犯有谋杀罪.

sentences.en: Michael's alias name is called and he goes for the CT scan.
sentences.cn: 叫到了Michael的别名,他去做了CT检查.
米克∙克拉克，又名锡德∙布朗

sentences.en: Mick Clark, alias Sid Brown, was wanted for questioning by the police.
sentences.cn: 米克·克拉克, 又名锡德·布朗, 被警方通缉审问.

sentences.en: The name Darren was an alias he used to avoid the police.
sentences.cn: 达伦是他用来逃避警察的化名.

sentences.en: The thief's real name was John Smith, alias Edward Ball.
sentences.cn: 这小偷的真名是约翰史密斯, 化名叫爱德华鲍尔.

sentences.en: They eventually settled on J . J . Abrams, the creator of the TV spy show, Alias.
sentences.cn: 他们最后选定J. J. 亚伯拉罕, 也就是电影集《双面女间谍》的制片.

sentences.en: This item has XX alias ( es ). These aliases will be removed, as well.
sentences.cn: 此项目有xx个别名. 这些别名也将被删除.

sentences.en: Using an alias, he had rented a house in Fleet, Hampshire.
sentences.cn: 他用化名在汉普郡的舰队街租了间房子。

sentences.en: Vitis alias: autumn purple, tiger eye, purple grapes, lions eye.
sentences.cn: 龙眼葡萄别名: 秋紫 、 老虎眼 、 紫葡萄 、 狮子眼.
威廉.约翰逊, 又名詹姆斯. 杰克逊.

sentences.en: You can replace this automatically generated alias with a more meaningful one.
sentences.cn: 可用更有意义的名称替换这一自动生成的别名.

sentences.en: You must specify a valid parent alias - or none at all.
sentences.cn: 您必须指定正确的上层别名 - 或完全不指定.

trans.tran_cn: 以化名为人所知，化名为，别名为，别称又被称为

trans.tran_en: a false name, usually used by a criminal
